name: buff booty baby
description:
YOU'RE THE MOST POWERFUL BEING IN EXISTENCE........

BUTT.

----------------------------------
Made in 1 hour, taking 10 minute turns to work on it on one computer
----------------------------------

~ PACKED WITH FEATURES~

Including:

ROLLING AROUND with WASD

CINEMATIC effects and camera moves

SMASH space button to really GOOOO

PHOTO-REAL TERRAIN

PARTICLES

SCREENSHOTS with F10 (check the _data folder > screenshots, only works with download version)

"Honestly the game is just good" - Kotaku

"Damn." - PC Gamer

"I wish my parents let me play this but it's just 2 good....." - Gamespot

"If this game was a rock............It'd be a big rOCK!" - Rock Paper Shotgun

"Ohmygosh the amount of polygons in this game." - Polygon
